QuestData.Title: Broker's Bounty: Nocturnus the Unraveler
QuestData.Description:
A nefarious Maw magus named Nocturnus the Unraveler is hampering the efforts of the Cartel in Korthia.
Anyone who exterminates this evil will be rewarded.
Use caution. Nocturnus is a powerful foe. You may require several allies to defeat him.
